amendment.description: To authorize the use of amounts for Medical Services to be used to furnish rehabilitative equipment and human-powered vehicles to certain disabled veterans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3910 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3910 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Klobuchar to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2966-2969; text: CR S2968) To authorize the use of amounts for Medical Services to be used to furnish rehabilitative equipment and human-powered vehicles to certain disabled veterans.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3910 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3910 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Klobuchar to Amendment SA 3896.
